resume_extraction.raw_text:
SARAH JOHNSON
Email: sarah.johnson@email.com
Phone: (555) 987-6543
Location: New York, NY

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience in full-stack development, 
specializing in React, Node.js, Python, and cloud technologies. Proven track 
record of leading technical teams and delivering scalable solutions for fintech 
and healthcare industries.

TECHNICAL SKILLS
• Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python, TypeScript, Java, Go
• Frontend: React, Vue.js, Angular, HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Redux
• Backend: Node.js, Express, Django, FastAPI, Spring Boot
• Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
• Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, GitLab CI
• Tools: Git, Webpack, Jest, Cypress, Postman, Jira

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

Lead Software Engineer | FinTech Solutions Inc. | 2022 - Present
• Led a team of 8 engineers in developing a real-time trading platform using React and Node.js
• Architected and implemented microservices architecture serving 500K+ daily active users
• Reduced system response time by 60% through performance optimization and caching strategies
• Mentored junior developers and established code review processes
• Technologies: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS, Docker

Senior Full Stack Developer | HealthTech Innovations | 2020 - 2022
• Developed patient management system using React frontend and Django backend
• Implemented HIPAA-compliant data handling and security measures
• Built RESTful APIs serving mobile and web applications with 99.9% uptime
• Collaborated with UX designers and product managers in agile environment
• Technologies: React, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, Jest

Software Engineer | TechStart Solutions | 2018 - 2020
• Built responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
• Developed automated testing suites reducing deployment bugs by 45%
• Participated in on-call rotations and incident response procedures
• Contributed to open-source projects and technical documentation
• Technologies: Vue.js, Node.js, MongoDB, Express, Docker

EDUCATION
Master of Science in Computer Science
Stanford University | 2018
GPA: 3.8/4.0
Thesis: "Machine Learning Applications in Real-time Systems"

Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering  
University of California, Berkeley | 2016
GPA: 3.7/4.0
Dean's List: Fall 2015, Spring 2016

PROJECTS
Cryptocurrency Trading Bot
• Developed algorithmic trading bot using Python and ML models
• Integrated with multiple exchange APIs for real-time trading
• Technologies: Python, TensorFlow, REST APIs, MongoDB
• Duration: 6 months

Open Source Contribution - React Performance Library
• Contributed to popular React optimization library with 10K+ GitHub stars
• Implemented lazy loading and memoization features
• Technologies: React, JavaScript, Webpack, Jest
• Impact: Used by 50+ companies globally

CERTIFICATIONS
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional (2023)
• Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) (2022) 
• Google Cloud Professional Developer (2021)
• Certified Scrum Master (CSM) (2020)

jd_extraction.raw_text:
Senior Full Stack Engineer - Remote

TechCorp Inc.
Location: Remote (US/Canada)
Employment Type: Full-time

JOB SUMMARY
We are seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our engineering team. 
You will be responsible for architecting and building scalable web applications using 
modern technologies and leading technical initiatives.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
- Design and develop full-stack applications using React and Node.js
- Build and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
- Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers
- Mentor junior developers and participate in code reviews  
- Optimize application performance and ensure scalability
- Participate in on-call rotations and incident response
- Contribute to technical documentation and best practices

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
- 5+ years of experience in full-stack software development
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, React, and Node.js
- Experience with modern database systems (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Strong understanding of software engineering best practices
- Experience with agile development methodologies
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
- Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 7+ years of software development experience
- Experience with TypeScript and modern frontend frameworks
- Knowledge of microservices architecture and distributed systems
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
- Previous experience in fintech or healthcare industries
- Leadership experience and mentoring capabilities
- Contributions to open-source projects

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- React.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
- Node.js, Express.js, RESTful API design
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- AWS or Azure cloud services
- Docker, Kubernetes
- Git, CI/CD tools
- Testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)

BENEFITS
- Competitive salary range: $130,000 - $180,000
- Equity participation and performance bonuses
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- Flexible work arrangements and unlimited PTO
- Professional development budget ($3,000 annually)
- Top-tier equipment and home office stipend

COMPANY INFO
TechCorp Inc. is a fast-growing technology company building next-generation 
software solutions for enterprise customers. We value innovation, collaboration, 
and continuous learning in a remote-first environment.

job_description.original_text:
Senior Full Stack Engineer - Remote

TechCorp Inc.
Location: Remote (US/Canada)
Employment Type: Full-time

JOB SUMMARY
We are seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Engineer to join our engineering team. 
You will be responsible for architecting and building scalable web applications using 
modern technologies and leading technical initiatives.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
- Design and develop full-stack applications using React and Node.js
- Build and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices architecture
- Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers
- Mentor junior developers and participate in code reviews 
- Optimize application performance and ensure scalability
- Participate in on-call rotations and incident response
- Contribute to technical documentation and best practices

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
- 5+ years of experience in full-stack software development
- Strong proficiency in JavaScript, React, and Node.js
- Experience with modern database systems (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
- Experience with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
- Strong understanding of software engineering best practices
- Experience with agile development methodologies
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
- Master's degree in Computer Science or related field
- 7+ years of software development experience
- Experience with TypeScript and modern frontend frameworks
- Knowledge of microservices architecture and distributed systems
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
- Previous experience in fintech or healthcare industries
- Leadership experience and mentoring capabilities
- Contributions to open-source projects

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS
- React.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
- Node.js, Express.js, RESTful API design
- PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- AWS or Azure cloud services
- Docker, Kubernetes
- Git, CI/CD tools
- Testing frameworks (Jest, Cypress)

BENEFITS
- Competitive salary range: $130,000 - $180,000
- Equity participation and performance bonuses
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
- Flexible work arrangements and unlimited PTO
- Professional development budget ($3,000 annually)
- Top-tier equipment and home office stipend

COMPANY INFO
TechCorp Inc. is a fast-growing technology company building next-generation 
software solutions for enterprise customers. We value innovation, collaboration, 
and continuous learning in a remote-first environment.
